products.name: Rough Diamond Studio — Alpha Access
products.description: Alpha access to the flagship audio podcasting and content creation system. Perfect for operators who ship weekly.
products.longDescription: Rough Diamond Studio is a composable, enterprise-grade audio pipeline for podcasting and content creation. This alpha version includes: Audio pipeline for recording, editing, and publishing; Editorial ops dashboard for episode management; Asset generation for social and distribution; Team collaboration features; Integration ready for RSS, hosting, and monetization platforms.

products.name: Business on Purpose — Founder's Journal
products.description: Structured journal for business operators building durable systems.
products.longDescription: A guided journal designed for founders and operators implementing the systems discussed on Business on Purpose. Includes weekly reflection prompts, operational checklists, and a framework for sustainable business building.

products.name: Business on Purpose — Systems Playbook
products.description: Templates and frameworks for building operational systems.
products.longDescription: Ready-to-use templates and implementation guides for the core business systems discussed in the podcast. Includes org charts, financial tracking, hiring frameworks, and process documentation.

products.name: Business on Purpose — Building Systems Course
products.description: Comprehensive 6-week course on building sustainable business systems.
products.longDescription: A structured, 6-week course covering the frameworks shared on Business on Purpose. Includes video lessons, downloadable resources, community forum access, and 30-minute implementation consulting call.

products.name: When Life Bites — Resilience Journal
products.description: Guided journal for navigating grief, pressure, and high-stakes seasons.
products.longDescription: A companion journal to the When Life Bites podcast. Designed for founders and humans going through difficult seasons. Includes reflection prompts, coping strategies, and a framework for resilience building.

products.name: When Life Bites — Companion Guide
products.description: Episode reference guide with resources and deep dives.
products.longDescription: A comprehensive guide to episodes of When Life Bites, with linked resources, book recommendations, further reading, and expert contact information mentioned in the podcast.

products.name: When Life Bites — Retreat Program
products.description: Exclusive retreat experience for community members.
products.longDescription: A 3-day in-person retreat (RSA-based, expandable to other regions) for listeners going through challenging seasons. Includes expert facilitation, peer cohorts, workshops, and community building. Limited to 20 participants.
